title: The Vision of Caldaria
description: A thousand years have passed since an evil sorcerer banished the Caldar people from their home in Caldaria. Their hopes to return home rest on a young woman who may be the most powerful Caldar in a millennium. Myla, a former Caldar outcast, must reconcile the Caldar's past before she can unravel the secrets to their future. This proves difficult, as mysterious forces thwart her every effort. Caldaria's fate hangs in the balance as Myla decides whom she can trust and whether she should proceed. The Vision of Caldaria is the first book in a fast-paced adventure trilogy where Myla and her friends confront self-doubt, fear, and prejudice as they explore Caldaria and try to prevent the destruction of the Caldar people.
author: J.F. Slade
